name: Blacksmith - Merge Idle RPG
description:
Become a Blacksmith and merge your way to the top!

What do you get when you cross two swords? A crossbow! Sure, it doesn't make much sense, but that's the life of a Blacksmith...apparently.

Craft over 81 different fully-modeled weapons and grow your smithing empire! Then unlock The Enchanted to discover more special items!

Collect and utilize magical runes to multiply earned gold, duplicate your items, and more!

Progress slowing down? Reset to collect Soul Gems and start over with a huge boost!

With over 1,000,000+ downloads and counting, a new incremental game from Fumb Games has merged its way to the App Store.

New features are being added constantly, and so far every feature request we've received in Discord has been implemented into the game!

Note: Blacksmith - Merge Idle RPG is and will always be 100% free to play, but we do offer optional in-app purchases/advertising for those who enjoy and wish to support us. These will always be optional! If we ever start forcing you to buy something, assume that we have been replaced with evil doppelgängers.

What are you waiting for? Go merge and become Master Blacksmith!
